arguments.name: IN=
arguments.description: specifies the password to encode. The password can contain up to a maximum of 512 characters, which include alphanumeric characters, spaces, and special characters.

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: specifies a fileref to which the output string is to be written. If the OUT= option is not specified, the output string is written to the SAS log.

arguments.name: METHOD=
arguments.description: specifies the encoding method. Here are the supported values for encoding-method.

arguments.name: SAS002
arguments.description: uses a 32-bit fixed key. Uses SAS Proprietary encryption.

arguments.name: SAS003
arguments.description: uses a 256-bit fixed key plus a 16-bit random salt value. Uses AES encryption.

arguments.name: SAS004
arguments.description: uses a 256-bit fixed key and a 64-bit random salt value. Uses AES encryption.

arguments.name: SAS005
arguments.description: uses a 256-bit fixed key, a 64-bit random salt value, and is hashed for additional iterations. Uses AES encryption.
